Articles.Content:
sooo hi there.

first ever requist and its actually a stupendously easy one, but i have failed at it myself so far:

can someone make me a rescaled claw compatible in size with the smallest stock parst, as in the tiny orange engine/xenon engine thing, that size.

(i suck at getting the rescale factor to work it seems)

many thanks in advance
Try using the normal claw with the TweakScale mod.

The transparent command pod download includes a tiny claw that is the exact size you want...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84054

Asteroid cities also has a probe sized claw, but it's style is a little different, based of the Philae lander

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79675
